## Web scraping Taskmaster data

In this class activity, you will practice some web scraping Taskmaster data. You will need to load the `rvest` and `tidyverse` packages.

1. Following the class example of scraping Charlotte Ritchie's birthday, scrape the Series 15 champion from [https://taskmaster.fandom.com/wiki/Series_15](https://taskmaster.fandom.com/wiki/Series_15)

2. Write a `for` loop to create a vector containing the champion from each series (1 -- 16). You can create a vector of urls for the different series with

```{r, eval=F}
paste0("https://taskmaster.fandom.com/wiki/Series_", 1:16)
```


3. Alex Horne is the creator of Taskmaster. Scrape Alex Horne's twitter url from [https://taskmaster.fandom.com/wiki/Alex_Horne](https://taskmaster.fandom.com/wiki/Alex_Horne).
